name: HijriDate
0:
”Alexa start Hijri date”
”Alexa open Hijri date”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hijri date
des:
This skill is created to tell you about the equivalent Hijri date of today's Gregorian date.
-Just start the skill by Saying: "Alexa, start Hijri date".
-To know the Hijri date just say: "Hijri date of {Gregorian Date}" 
-Gregorian Date format must be (20018-03-27)
-
